patch:
@@ -8,7 +8,8 @@
         android:label="@string/app_name"
         android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
         android:supportsRtl="true"
-        android:theme="@style/Theme.MyCalc">
+        android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
+        <activity android:name=".Settings"></activity>
         <activity android:name=".MainActivity">
             <intent-filter>
                 <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@drawable/mycalc_background"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textViewResult"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/LandTextViewResult"
+        tools:text="asdasdasd" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textViewMain"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/LandTextViewMain"/>
+
+    <include layout="@layout/keyboard_table" />
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,193 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:gravity="center"
+    android:orientation="horizontal"
+    android:layout_centerHorizontal="true">
+    <TableLayout
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="10dp">
+
+        <TableRow
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button1"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button1Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button2"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button2Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button3"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button3Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+        </TableRow>
+
+        <TableRow
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button4"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button4Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button5"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button5Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button6"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button6Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+        </TableRow>
+
+        <TableRow
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button7"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button7Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button8"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button8Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button9"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button9Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+        </TableRow>
+    </TableLayout>
+
+    <TableLayout
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+
+        <TableRow
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonCE"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_span="2"
+                android:text="@string/buttonResetCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonPercent"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonPercentCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonSign"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonSignCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+        </TableRow>
+
+        <TableRow
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonMinus"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonMinusCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonPlus"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonPlusCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonMultiply"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonMultiplyCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonDivide"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonDivideCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+        </TableRow>
+
+        <TableRow
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button0"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/button0Caption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonPoint"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:text="@string/buttonPointCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonEqually"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_span="2"
+                android:text="@string/buttonEquallyCaption"
+                style="@style/LandButton"/>
+        </TableRow>
+
+
+    </TableLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/linearLayout"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:background="@drawable/mycalc_background"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/textViewResult"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            style="@style/TextViewResult"
+            tools:text="asdasdasd" />
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/textViewMain"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            style="@style/TextViewMain"/>
+        <include layout="@layout/keyboard_table"/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,180 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<TableLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/TableRow_marginBottom"
+        android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonCE"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/buttonResetCaption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonPercent"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/buttonPercentCaption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonSign"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/buttonSignCaption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonPlus"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginRight="0dp"
+            android:text="@string/buttonPlusCaption" />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/TableRow_marginBottom"
+        android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button1"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button1Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button2"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button2Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button3"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button3Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonMinus"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginRight="0dp"
+            android:text="@string/buttonMinusCaption" />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/TableRow_marginBottom"
+        android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button4"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button4Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button5"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button5Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button6"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button6Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonMultiply"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginRight="0dp"
+            android:text="@string/buttonMultiplyCaption" />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/TableRow_marginBottom"
+        android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button7"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button7Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button8"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button8Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button9"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button9Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonDivide"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginRight="0dp"
+            android:text="@string/buttonDivideCaption" />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+
+        android:gravity="center_horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/button0"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/button0Caption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonPoint"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="@string/buttonPointCaption" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonEqually"
+            style="@style/Button"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginRight="0dp"
+            android:layout_span="2"
+            android:text="@string/buttonEquallyCaption" />
+    </TableRow>
+</TableLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    tools:context=".Settings">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="Settings"
+        android:textSize="36sp"/>
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_back"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="Back"
+        android:textSize="36sp"/>
+    <RadioGroup
+        android:id="@+id/radioButtons"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/radioButtonStandartTheme"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="Стандартная тема" />
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/radioButtonDarkTheme"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="Темная тема" />
+
+    </RadioGroup>
+
+
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources>
+
+    <style name="Button" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        <item name="cornerRadius">@dimen/ButtonCornerRadius</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_marginRight">@dimen/ButtonMarginRight</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingTop">@dimen/ButtonPaddingTop</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingBottom">@dimen/ButtonPaddingBottom</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/ButtonTextSize</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="TextViewMain" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">@dimen/TextViewMainMarginBottom</item>
+        <item name="android:background">@color/textViewMainColor</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingStart">@dimen/TextViewMainPaddingStart</item>
+        <item name="android:text">@string/TextViewMainText</item>
+        <item name="singleLine">true</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/TextViewMainTextSize</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="TextViewResult">
+        <item name="android:layout_marginTop">@dimen/TextViewResultMarginTop</item>
+        <item name="android:maxLines">2</item>
+        <item name="android:minLines">2</item>
+        <item name="paddingStart">@dimen/TextViewResultPaddingStart</item>
+        <item name="android:text">@string/TextViewMainResultText</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/TextViewResultTextSize</item>
+    </style>
+
+
+    //landscape
+
+    <style name="LandButton" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        <item name="android:layout_marginRight">@dimen/ButtonMarginRight</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingTop">@dimen/LandButtonPaddingTop</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingBottom">@dimen/ButtonPaddingBottom</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/ButtonTextSize</item>
+        <item name="cornerRadius">@dimen/ButtonCornerRadius</item>
+        <item name="backgroundTint">@color/white</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">@color/black</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="LandTextViewResult" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        <item name="android:layout_marginTop">10dp</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingLeft">@dimen/TextViewResultPaddingStart</item>
+        <item name="android:text">@string/TextViewMainResultText</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/TextViewResultTextSize</item>
+        <item name="android:minLines">1</item>
+        <item name="maxLines">1</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">@color/black</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="LandTextViewMain" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        <item name="android:layout_marginBottom">@dimen/LandTextViewMainMarginBottom</item>
+        <item name="android:background">@color/textViewMainColor</item>
+        <item name="android:paddingLeft">@dimen/TextViewMainPaddingStart</item>
+        <item name="android:text">@string/TextViewMainText</item>
+        <item name="singleLine">true</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/TextViewMainTextSize</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">@color/black</item>
+    </style>
+    <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/design_default_color_primary</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimaryDark">@color/design_default_color_primary_dark</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">#f95542</item>
+    </style>
+
+
+
+    <style name="StandartTheme" parent="AppTheme">
+        <item name="android:textSize">24sp</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">@color/design_default_color_primary</item>
+        <item name="android:fontFamily">cursive</item>
+        <item name="backgroundTint">@color/white</item>
+    </style>
+    <style name="DarkTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents">
+        <item name="background">@color/black</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">@color/white</item>
+
+    </style>
+
+
+
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file
